titleStmt.title: Gods generall summons to his last parliament. By George Phillips
titleStmt.author: Phillips, George, fl. 1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Peter Short] for William Leake, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Crane,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from colophon; printer's name from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Crane
